headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.vercel.app *.spline.design *.googletagmanager.com *.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https: *.unsplash.com *.vercel.app *.githubusercontent.com *.spline.design *.ytimg.com *.youtube.com *.google-analytics.com *.googletagmanager.com; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app *.spline.design *.google-analytics.com *.analytics.google.com *.googletagmanager.com arealchain-api.troniextechnologies.com arl-bd.onrender.com; frame-src 'self' *.youtube.com *.youtube-nocookie.com *.spline.design; object-src 'self' *.spline.design;
